prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia State Reading Association records, 1967-2008. Accession 44849. Organization records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Virginia State Reading Association

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The Virginia State Reading Association was established in 1967 and its goal is to promote literacy in Virginia through collaboration, advocacy, and professional development. It is part of the International Reading Association which was founded in 1956 to promote worldwide literacy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1967-2008, of the Virginia State Reading Association consisting of agendas, budgets, bylaws, correspondence, directories, financial records, flyers, forms, journals, lists, minutes, newsletters, notes, pamphlets, programs, questionnaires, reports, rosters, and other papers concerning the operations and objectives of the organization promoting literacy in Virginia, working as a member council of the International Reading Association.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: Series X: Job Announcements and Positions, 1995-2004

scopecontent.p: Board of Directors, 1967-2007, contains agendas, budgets, bylaws, correspondence, financial records, flyers, forms, lists, minutes, newsletters, notes, pamphlets, questionnaires, reports, rosters, and other records concerning the meetings of the board of directors. Papers include some records relating to leadership workshops/conferences. Up until 1978, the board of directors was called the executive board. In 1978, the name was changed to board of directors and a new executive board was created.

did.unittitle: Board of Directors meeting minutes, July 1978-May 1979.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, August 1979-April 1980.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1980-May 1981.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1981-May 1982.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, August 1982-May 1983.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1983-June 1984.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1984-June 1985.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1985-May 1986.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1986-May 1987.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1987-May 1988.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1988-May 1989.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1989-May 1990.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1990-June 1991.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September 1991-May 1992.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, September-October 1992.
Board of Directors meeting and leadership workshop, 22 May 1993.
Board of Directors leadership retreat, 30-31 May 1997.
Board of Directors leadership retreat, 30-31 May 1998.
Board of Directors meeting and leadership conference, 21 & 23 May 1999.
Board of Directors meeting and leadership conference, 2 June 2000 (folder 1 of 2).
Board of Directors meeting, 2 June 2000 (folder 2 of 2).
Board of Directors at the International Reading Association, 1 May 2001.
Board of Directors meeting and leadership conference, 16-18 May 2003.

scopecontent.p: Executive Board/Governing Council, 1978-2007, contains agendas, budgets, bylaws, correspondence, financial records, flyers, forms, lists, minutes, newsletters, notes, pamphlets, questionnaires, reports, rosters, and other records concerning the meetings of the executive board and governing council. Papers include some records relating to leadership conferences. Up until 1978, the board of directors was called the executive board. In 1978, the name was changed to board of directors and a new executive board was created. In 1997 the executive board became the governing council.

Leadership Workshops/Conferences, 1985-1987, 1994-1999, contains agendas, correspondence, financial records, flyers, lists, memorandums, minutes, reports, rosters, surveys, and other papers regarding the organization and operation of leadership workshops and conferences.
Delegates Assemblies, 1980-2007, consists of agendas, bylaws, correspondence, financial records, minutes, and notes concerning the annual delegates assemblies held by the VSRA.

arrangement.p: Conferences, 1970-2005, contains agendas, bookings, booklets, brochures, budgets, correspondence, financial records, flyers, forms, lists, minutes, programs, proposals, registration forms, rosters, schedules, and other papers concerning the booking, planning, and arranging of the conferences, as well as the conference itself.

did.unittitle: Conference, 1986 (registration, program, signs, displays, exhibits, hotel, evaluation forms).

scopecontent.p: Financial Records, 1968-2008, contains audits, balance sheets, budgets, financial statements, ledgers, payment authorizations, receipts, reports, and other documents regarding the financial operations of the Virginia State Reading Association.

Committees, 1974-2003, consists of ballots, brochures, correspondence, directories, flyers, forms, lists, memorandums, minutes, newsletters, objectives, recommendations, reports, rosters, and other papers detailing the organization and function of the committees of the Virginia State Reading Association. Includes the president's and state coordinator's reports.

did.unittitle: Adult Literacy; Adult and Inter-generational Literacy committee, 1986-1998.
Parents and Reading committee, 1985-1990, 1995, 1998, no date.
Publications committee, 1977-1987 (journal Reading in Virginia, newsletter).
Resolutions and Legislation committee (Legislative committee), 1989-2000, no date.
Teachers as Readers committee and Reading Teacher of the Year committee, 1992-1993, 1998-1999.

Committees: Assessment; Bylaws; Citation and Remembrance; Conference; Evaluation; Exemplary Reading Award; Foundation; Handbook; Internal Audit; International Projects; Long Range Planning; and Mailing, 1974, 1977, 1979, 1986, 1990-1999.
Committees: Past Presidents' Advisory; Program; Special Projects; Technology and Reading Literacy; and VEMA committee, 1977, 1992-1999.

scopecontent.p: Bylaws and Policies, 1970-2003, contains bylaws, policy manuals and handbooks, and mission and goal statements of the Virginia State Reading Association.

did.unittitle: Mission statements, goals, and miscellaneous papers, 1976-1998.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, 1972-2003, contains letters discussing and detailing the operations and goals of the Virginia State Reading Association, as well as its relationship with the International Reading Association and with local councils.

did.unittitle: Series X: Job Announcements and Positions, 1995-2004.

scopecontent.p: Job Announcements and Positions, 1995-2004, contains information on the positions of administrative assistant, administrative secretary for membership, conference headquarters registrar, executive secretary, and legislative advocate.
Directories, 1987-2007 contain contact information for board members and officers, committee chairs, local council heads, and other officials of the Virginia State Reading Association.

Local Councils contain articles, brochures, conference registration forms, correspondence, flyers, newsletters, programs, reports, and other papers concerning the organization and operation of local councils.

did.unittitle: Local Councils (Apple Valley, Chesapeake, Greater Washington, Hampton).
Local Councils (Newport News, Norfolk, North Central Virginia).
Local Councils (Rappahannock, Richmond Area, Roanoke Valley).
Local Councils (Shenandoah Valley, Southside, Southwestern, Suffolk).
Local Councils (Virginia Beach, multiple councils [Hampton-Newport News-Williamsburg], general papers).

scopecontent.p: Awards and Honor/Merit Councils, 1986-2000, contains papers relating to awards both given and received by the Virginia State Reading Association, and papers relating to honor/merit designations to local councils by the Virginia Reading Association and the International Reading Association.

did.unittitle: International Reading Association Award of Excellence, 1998-1999 (folder 1 of 4).
International Reading Association Award of Excellence, 1998-1999 (folder 2 of 4).
International Reading Association Award of Excellence, 1998-1999 (folder 3 of 4).
International Reading Association Award of Excellence, 1998-1999 (folder 4 of 4).

scopecontent.p: International Reading Association, 1983-1999, contains brochures, catalogs, charts, correspondence, forms, newspapers, programs, minutes, statements, and other papers concerning the International Reading Association. The Virginia State Reading Association is an affiliated council.

did.unittitle: Conferences: 12th World Congress on Reading; Southeastern Regional Conferences; Eastern Regional Conferences; College Reading Association Conference; general conference).

scopecontent.p: Publications, 1969-2006, consist of Virginia State Reading Association newsletter, Reading in Virginia journal, Journal of the Virginia College Reading Educators, GWRC Journal, and brochures.

did.unittitle: Reading in Virginia volume XIII (special edition edited by the Greater Washington Reading Council), 1988.
Reading in Virginia volume XXIII, 1998-1999 (2 copies).
Reading in Virginia volume XXV, 2000-2001 (2 copies).
Reading in Virginia volume XXVI, 2001-2002 (2 copies).
Reading in Virginia volume XXVII, 2003-2004 (2 copies).
Journal of the Virginia College Reading Educators, 1983, 1990.
GWRC Journal volume XXII (Greater Washington Reading Council), 1997-1998.

scopecontent.p: General subjects contain articles, artwork, books, directories (non-organization), essays, guidelines, notebooks, packets, position papers, programs, proposals, and other papers. Includes tote bag and magnets.

unittitle.title: The Advisory Board on Teacher Education and Licensure's Proposal to Revise Licensure Regulations for School Personnel.

did.unittitle: Anguished English: An Anthology of Accidental Assaults upon our Language by Richard Lederer.
Degrees of Reading Power as Virginia's Passport to Literacy..
